alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 22 at 2:56AM MST until October 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. A few localized gusts up to 60 mph are possible. * WHERE...portions of northeastern Arizona. * WHEN...From noon today to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264
